author: Anonymous Comp
title: Passcode for 201 lecture
question:
Hi I tried the passcode in the Zoom links post next to the Vantage lecture for the 201 lecture to join it, but it isn't working. Is 22T+dg1z  the passcode for all lectures?
Thanks
instructor_answer: You can access the recordings for section 201 through Canvas. Just click Zoom on the navigation bar and then the Cloud Recordings tab. You’ll then see links to each of the class recordings.
